title: Scientists warn that Trump is wrong: Warm weather won’t kill coronavirus – BGR
content: President Trump said in the past that warmer weather will make the virus disappear “miraculously,” starting in April. COVID-19 caseloads in countries with warmer climates, as well as coronavirus cases from warm US states like California and Florida, prove the virus can be very infectious regardless of the weather.
warning: Based on the content, title and language on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
